org.conqat.lib.commons.datamining

Class TopNRecommender<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.datamining.TopNRecommender<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRecommender<T>

    public class TopNRecommender<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRecommender<T>
    Trivial recommender that always returns the top n used items from the training data, independent of the query. The confidence is set to a fixed value of .5 for all recommendations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TopNRecommender(RecommenderRatingDatabase<T> ratingDatabase, int numRecommendations)
      Constructs a new TopNRecommender using the given rating data base.

      • TopNRecommender

        public TopNRecommender(RecommenderRatingDatabase<T> ratingDatabase,
                       int numRecommendations)
        Constructs a new TopNRecommender using the given rating data base. There have to be at least numRecommendations entries in the data base.
